property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you placed at least 1 virus counter on a program this turn. Place 2 virus counters on that program.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You must yell "surge" to get the full effect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The rez cost of all ice is increased by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And all should cry, Beware! Beware! His flashing eyes, his floating hair! Weave a circle around him thrice, And close your eyes with holy dread, For he on honey-dew hath fed, And drunk the milk of Paradise. -Samuel Taylor Coleridge

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Dispossessed Ristie

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I run with the best."

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Dispossessed Ristie

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I run with the best."

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Dispossessed Ristie

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I run with the best."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove 1 tag. You may pay 1 [Credits] to add Networking to your grip instead of trashing it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgement of the corporate simpletons she met there.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you access cards from HQ, access 1 additional card from HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: X [Recurring Credits] Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 5 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She at her PAD. I at my rig. Low lights. Smooth jazz. Love blooms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do you really need another one?

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 2 [Link], the memory cost of Creeper is 0, even if it is not installed. 2 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The itsy bitsy spider went up the data spout..." - Chaos Theory

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you stole an agenda this turn. Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Early permutations of the kraken proved to be insatiable, ice-devouring marauders. Not much has changed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You cannot use Kati Jones more than once per turn. [Click]: Place 3 [Credits] from the bank on Kati Jones. [Click]: Take all credits from Kati Jones.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Click]: Place 3 [Credits] from the bank on Kati Jones.||[Click]: Take all credits from Kati Jones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You cannot use Kati Jones more than once per turn. [Click]: Place 3 [Credits] from the bank on Kati Jones. [Click]: Take all credits from Kati Jones.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Click]: Place 3 [Credits] from the bank on Kati Jones.||[Click]: Take all credits from Kati Jones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 16 [Credits] from the bank on Eve Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Eve Campaign, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 [Credits] from Eve Campaign.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Also known as "development hell."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This ice sucks." - g00ru

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, look at a number of cards from the top of the Runner's stack equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength. Trash 1 of those cards, and arrange the rest in any order.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 2.||(If Trace Successful) Look at the top X cards from the runner's deck, trash one and re-arrange the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, trace5 - if successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keeping tabs on the world, one screen at a time.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Tracer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Salvage can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag." for each advancement token on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're not in Kansas anymore.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Recurring Credits] Use these credits to advance cards in or protecting this server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A job done once is a job done right."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trace7 - If successful, trash 1 virtual resource or 1 link.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's kind of like an anagram." - designer Phoenix
